created_by_id.title: Created By Id
created_by_id.description: The id of the user that made this object.

last_updated_by_id.title: Last Updated By Id
last_updated_by_id.description: The id of the user that made this object.

created_at.title: Created At
created_at.description: The timestamp when the object was created.

updated_at.title: Updated At
updated_at.description: The timestamp when the object was last updated.

id.title: Id
id.description: The human-friendly ID of the Message

agent_id.title: Agent Id
agent_id.description: The unique identifier of the agent.

model.title: Model
model.description: The model used to make the function call.

text.title: Text
text.description: The text content of the message.

type.title: Type
type.description: Indicates this content represents a tool call event.

id.title: Id
id.description: A unique identifier for this specific tool call instance.

name.title: Name
name.description: The name of the tool being called.

input.title: Input
input.description: The parameters being passed to the tool, structured as a dictionary of parameter names to values.

type.title: Type
type.description: Indicates this content represents a tool return event.

tool_call_id.title: Tool Call Id
tool_call_id.description: References the ID of the ToolCallContent that initiated this tool call.

content.title: Content
content.description: The content returned by the tool execution.

is_error.title: Is Error
is_error.description: Indicates whether the tool execution resulted in an error.

type.title: Type
type.description: Indicates this is a reasoning/intermediate step.

is_native.title: Is Native
is_native.description: Whether the reasoning content was generated by a reasoner model that processed this step.

reasoning.title: Reasoning
reasoning.description: The intermediate reasoning or thought process content.

signature.title: Signature
signature.description: A unique identifier for this reasoning step.

type.title: Type
type.description: Indicates this is a redacted thinking step.

data.title: Data
data.description: The redacted or filtered intermediate reasoning content.

type.title: Type
type.description: Indicates this is an omitted reasoning step.

tokens.title: Tokens
tokens.description: The reasoning token count for intermediate reasoning content.

name.title: Name
name.description: For role user/assistant: the (optional) name of the participant. For role tool/function: the name of the function called.

tool_calls.title: Tool Calls
tool_calls.description: The list of tool calls requested. Only applicable for role assistant.

tool_call_id.title: Tool Call Id
tool_call_id.description: The ID of the tool call. Only applicable for role tool.

step_id.title: Step Id
step_id.description: The id of the step that this message was created in.

otid.title: Otid
otid.description: The offline threading id associated with this message

status.title: Status
status.description: The status of the tool call

stdout.title: Stdout
stdout.description: Captured stdout (e.g. prints, logs) from the tool invocation

stderr.title: Stderr
stderr.description: Captured stderr from the tool invocation

tool_returns.title: Tool Returns
tool_returns.description: Tool execution return information for prior tool calls

group_id.title: Group Id
group_id.description: The multi-agent group that the message was sent in

title: Message
description:
Letta's internal representation of a message. Includes methods to convert to/from LLM provider formats.

Attributes:
    id (str): The unique identifier of the message.
    role (MessageRole): The role of the participant.
    text (str): The text of the message.
    user_id (str): The unique identifier of the user.
    agent_id (str): The unique identifier of the agent.
    model (str): The model used to make the function call.
    name (str): The name of the participant.
    created_at (datetime): The time the message was created.
    tool_calls (List[OpenAIToolCall,]): The list of tool calls requested.
    tool_call_id (str): The id of the tool call.
